label1.title: <font size= '20'>The Deltoid Muscle- Function: </font size= '20'>
label1.text: <font size = '6'>Functions to move the upper arm away from the body </font size = '6'>

label2.title: <font size= 20>The Deltoid Muscle- Innervation:</font size= 20>
label2.text: <font size = 6>Is stimulated by the axillary nerve</font size = 6>

label3.title: <font size= 20>The Deltoid Muscle- Location:</font size= 20>
label3.text: <font size = 6>Resides on the side of the upper arm at the shoulder</font size = 6>

label4.title: <font size= 20>The Digital Flexor Muscles- Function:</font size= 20>
label4.text: <font size = 6>Function together to flex the fingers</font size = 6>

label5.title: <font size= 20>The Digital Flexor Muscles- Innervation:</font size= 20>
label5.text: <font size = 6>Are stimulated by the median and ulnar nerves</font size = 6>

label6.title: <font size= 20>The Digital Flexor Muscles- Location:</font size= 20>
label6.text: <font size = 6>Reside on the front of the forearm when the palm is facing forward</font size = 6>

label7.title: <font size= 20>The Triceps Muscle- Function:</font size= 20>
label7.text: <font size = 6>Functions to extend the lower arm at the elbow</font size = 6>

label8.title: <font size= 20>The Triceps Muscle- Innervation:</font size= 20>
label8.text: <font size = 6>Is stimulated by the radial nerve</font size = 6>

label9.title: <font size= 20>The Triceps Muscle- Location:</font size= 20>
label9.text: <font size = 6>Resides on the back of the arm</font size = 6>
